name: Letzte Instanz
description: '''Letzte Instanz''' is a German [[violin]]-[[Rock music|rock]] band, founded in [[Dresden]], Germany, in 1996, particularly noted for their use of the [[violin]] and [[cello]]. The founding members included HÃ¶rbi, Tin Whistle, Muttis Stolz, Kaspar Wichman, Holly D. and Markus G-Punkt. Benni Cellini and Robin Sohn entered the group a year later. To date, they have released eleven studio albums, two live albums, two live DVDs, three singles and have appeared on a number of mix CDs.
